<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">M</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Matrix</span><span class="p">([[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]])</span>

<span class="n">method_comparator</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">M</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'col_insert'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span>  <span class="n">Matrix</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">]))</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>调用col_insert()前:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left[\begin{matrix}1 & 2 & 3\\3 & 2 & 1\end{matrix}\right]$$
</div>

</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>调用后:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left[\begin{matrix}1 & 2 & 6 & 3\\3 & 2 & 6 & 1\end{matrix}\right]$$
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="矩阵计算">矩阵计算<a class="anchor-link" href="#矩阵计算">¶</a></h2><p>基本的矩阵计算像加法，减法，乘法，求逆可以通过pythhon的算符<code>+</code>,<code>-</code>,<code>*</code>,<code>**</code>来实现。</p>
<h3 id="加法">加法<a class="anchor-link" href="#加法">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [87]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">M</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Matrix</span><span class="p">([[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">]])</span>
<span class="n">N</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Matrix</span><span class="p">([[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">7</span><span class="p">]])</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'M'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">M</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'N'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">N</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'M+N'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">M</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="n">N</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>M
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left[\begin{matrix}1 & 3\\-2 & 3\end{matrix}\right]$$
</div>

</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>N
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left[\begin{matrix}0 & 3\\0 & 7\end{matrix}\right]$$
</div>

</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>M+N
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left[\begin{matrix}1 & 6\\-2 & 10\end{matrix}\right]$$
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="减法">减法<a class="anchor-link" href="#减法">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [88]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">M</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Matrix</span><span class="p">([[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">]])</span>
<span class="n">N</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Matrix</span><span class="p">([[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">7</span><span class="p">]])</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'M'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">M</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'N'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">N</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'M-N'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">M</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">N</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>M
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left[\begin{matrix}1 & 3\\-2 & 3\end{matrix}\right]$$
</div>

</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>N
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left[\begin{matrix}0 & 3\\0 & 7\end{matrix}\right]$$
</div>

</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>M-N
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left[\begin{matrix}1 & 0\\-2 & -4\end{matrix}\right]$$
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="乘法">乘法<a class="anchor-link" href="#乘法">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [89]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">M</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Matrix</span><span class="p">([[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]])</span>
<span class="n">N</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Matrix</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">])</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'M'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">M</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'N'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">N</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'MxN'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">M</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="n">N</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>M
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left[\begin{matrix}1 & 2 & 3\\3 & 2 & 1\end{matrix}\right]$$
</div>

</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>N
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left[\begin{matrix}0\\1\\1\end{matrix}\right]$$
</div>

</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_text output_subarea ">
<pre>'MxN'</pre>
</div>

</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left[\begin{matrix}5\\3\end{matrix}\right]$$
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="求逆">求逆<a class="anchor-link" href="#求逆">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [90]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">M</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Matrix</span><span class="p">([[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">]])</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'M'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">M</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'inverse of M:'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">M</span><span class="o">**</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">))</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>M
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left[\begin{matrix}1 & 3\\-2 & 3\end{matrix}\right]$$
</div>

</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>inverse of M:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left[\begin{matrix}\frac{1}{3} & - \frac{1}{3}\\\frac{2}{9} & \frac{1}{9}\end{matrix}\right]$$
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="行列式">行列式<a class="anchor-link" href="#行列式">¶</a></h2><p>用<code>det</code>计算矩阵的行列式</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [91]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">M</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Matrix</span><span class="p">([[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">]])</span>

<span class="n">method_comparator</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">M</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'det'</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>调用det()前:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left[\begin{matrix}1 & 0 & 1\\2 & -1 & 3\\4 & 3 & 2\end{matrix}\right]$$
</div>

</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>调用后:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$-1$$
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="行阶梯型矩阵">行阶梯型矩阵<a class="anchor-link" href="#行阶梯型矩阵">¶</a></h3><p>用<code>rref()</code>将矩阵处理成行阶梯型矩阵。 它返回两个结果，第一个是行阶梯型矩阵， 第二个是主元列的index。</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [92]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">M</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Matrix</span><span class="p">([[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">7</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">]])</span>

<span class="n">M_rref</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">pivot_columns</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">M</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">rref</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'原矩阵:'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">M</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'阶梯型:'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">M_rref</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'主元index:'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">pivot_columns</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>原矩阵:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left[\begin{matrix}1 & 0 & 1 & 3\\2 & 3 & 4 & 7\\-1 & -3 & -3 & -4\end{matrix}\right]$$
</div>

</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>阶梯型:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left[\begin{matrix}1 & 0 & 1 & 3\\0 & 1 & \frac{2}{3} & \frac{1}{3}\\0 & 0 & 0 & 0\end{matrix}\right]$$
</div>

</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>主元index:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left [ 0, \quad 1\right ]$$
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="零空间">零空间<a class="anchor-link" href="#零空间">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><code>nullspace()</code>返回一个能够张成矩阵零空间的向量组成的list。</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [93]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">M</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Matrix</span><span class="p">([[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]])</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'原矩阵M:'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">M</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'矩阵M的零空间的张成向量:'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">M</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">nullspace</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>原矩阵M:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left[\begin{matrix}1 & 2 & 3 & 0 & 0\\4 & 10 & 0 & 0 & 1\end{matrix}\right]$$
</div>

</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>矩阵M的零空间的张成向量:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left [ \left[\begin{matrix}-15\\6\\1\\0\\0\end{matrix}\right], \quad \left[\begin{matrix}0\\0\\0\\1\\0\end{matrix}\right], \quad \left[\begin{matrix}1\\- \frac{1}{2}\\0\\0\\1\end{matrix}\right]\right ]$$
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="列空间">列空间<a class="anchor-link" href="#列空间">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><code>columnspace()</code>返回一个能够张成矩阵列空间的向量组成的list。</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [94]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">M</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Matrix</span><span class="p">([[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span> <span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">1</span> <span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">3</span> <span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">]])</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'矩阵M:'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">M</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'张成矩阵M的列空间的向量:'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">M</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">columnspace</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>矩阵M:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left[\begin{matrix}1 & 1 & 2\\2 & 1 & 3\\3 & 1 & 4\end{matrix}\right]$$
</div>

</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>张成矩阵M的列空间的向量:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left [ \left[\begin{matrix}1\\2\\3\end{matrix}\right], \quad \left[\begin{matrix}1\\1\\1\end{matrix}\right]\right ]$$
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="特征值和特征向量">特征值和特征向量<a class="anchor-link" href="#特征值和特征向量">¶</a></h3><p>要计算矩阵的特征值，可以使用<code>eigenvals</code>。它返回由特征值:代数重数对组成的dict。</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [95]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">M</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Matrix</span><span class="p">([[</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span>  <span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span>  <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span>  <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span>  <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">]])</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'矩阵M'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">M</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'矩阵M的特征值和它们的代数重数:'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">M</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">eigenvals</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>矩阵M
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left[\begin{matrix}3 & -2 & 4 & -2\\5 & 3 & -3 & -2\\5 & -2 & 2 & -2\\5 & -2 & -3 & 3\end{matrix}\right]$$
</div>

</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>矩阵M的特征值和它们的代数重数:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left \{ -2 : 1, \quad 3 : 1, \quad 5 : 2\right \}$$
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><code>eigenvectors</code>返回由特征值，几何重数，特征向量列表组成的tuple。</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [96]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">M</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Matrix</span><span class="p">(</span>
    <span class="p">[</span>
        <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span>  <span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">],</span> 
        <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span>  <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">],</span> 
        <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span>  <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">],</span> 
        <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span>  <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="p">]</span>
<span class="p">)</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'矩阵M'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">M</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'特征值，几何重数，特征向量:'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">M</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">eigenvects</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>矩阵M
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left[\begin{matrix}3 & -2 & 4 & -2\\5 & 3 & -3 & -2\\5 & -2 & 2 & -2\\5 & -2 & -3 & 3\end{matrix}\right]$$
</div>

</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>特征值，几何重数，特征向量:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left [ \left ( -2, \quad 1, \quad \left [ \left[\begin{matrix}0\\1\\1\\1\end{matrix}\right]\right ]\right ), \quad \left ( 3, \quad 1, \quad \left [ \left[\begin{matrix}1\\1\\1\\1\end{matrix}\right]\right ]\right ), \quad \left ( 5, \quad 2, \quad \left [ \left[\begin{matrix}1\\1\\1\\0\end{matrix}\right], \quad \left[\begin{matrix}0\\-1\\0\\1\end{matrix}\right]\right ]\right )\right ]$$
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>如果只是想获得特征多项式， 用<code>charpoly()</code>和<code>factor()</code></p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [97]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'矩阵M'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">M</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">lamda</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">symbols</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'lamda'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">p</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">M</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">charpoly</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">lamda</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">factor</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'矩阵M的特征多项式'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">p</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>矩阵M
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left[\begin{matrix}3 & -2 & 4 & -2\\5 & 3 & -3 & -2\\5 & -2 & 2 & -2\\5 & -2 & -3 & 3\end{matrix}\right]$$
</div>

</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>矩阵M的特征多项式
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left(\lambda - 5\right)^{2} \left(\lambda - 3\right) \left(\lambda + 2\right)$$
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="对角化">对角化<a class="anchor-link" href="#对角化">¶</a></h2><p>如果要对角化一个矩阵，用<code>diagonalize()</code>。 它返回($P$,$D$)组成的tuple，其中$D$是对角矩阵并且满足$M = PDP^{-1}$。</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [98]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">M</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Matrix</span><span class="p">(</span>
    <span class="p">[</span>
        <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span>  <span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">],</span> 
        <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span>  <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">],</span> 
        <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span>  <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">],</span> 
        <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span>  <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="p">]</span>
<span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">P</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">D</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">M</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">diagonalize</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'矩阵M'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">M</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'矩阵P'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">P</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'矩阵D'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">D</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Latex</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'$PDP^{-1}$'</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">P</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="n">D</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="n">P</span><span class="o">**-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>矩阵M
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left[\begin{matrix}3 & -2 & 4 & -2\\5 & 3 & -3 & -2\\5 & -2 & 2 & -2\\5 & -2 & -3 & 3\end{matrix}\right]$$
</div>

</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>矩阵P
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left[\begin{matrix}0 & 1 & 1 & 0\\1 & 1 & 1 & -1\\1 & 1 & 1 & 0\\1 & 1 & 0 & 1\end{matrix}\right]$$
</div>

</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>矩阵D
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left[\begin{matrix}-2 & 0 & 0 & 0\\0 & 3 & 0 & 0\\0 & 0 & 5 & 0\\0 & 0 & 0 & 5\end{matrix}\right]$$
</div>

</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$PDP^{-1}$
</div>

</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left[\begin{matrix}3 & -2 & 4 & -2\\5 & 3 & -3 & -2\\5 & -2 & 2 & -2\\5 & -2 & -3 & 3\end{matrix}\right]$$
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h1 id="等式求解">等式求解<a class="anchor-link" href="#等式求解">¶</a></h1><h2 id="基本求解">基本求解<a class="anchor-link" href="#基本求解">¶</a></h2><p>代数等式求解的主要函数是<code>solveset()</code>。 它的语法是<code>solveset(equation, variable=None, domain=S.Complexes)</code></p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [99]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">eq</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Eq</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="o">**</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">func_comparator</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">eq</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">solveset</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>使用solveset()前:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$x^{2} - 1 = 0$$
</div>

</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>使用后:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left\{-1, 1\right\}$$
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>如果<code>solveset()</code>中传入一个表达式而非等式， 那么它会被假设等于0,。</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [100]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">expr</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="o">**</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span>

<span class="n">func_comparator</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">expr</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">solveset</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>使用solveset()前:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$x^{2} - 1$$
</div>

</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>使用后:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left\{-1, 1\right\}$$
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>求解结果可以是无限集合。</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [101]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">eq</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Eq</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">sin</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">func_comparator</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">eq</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">solveset</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>使用solveset()前:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\sin{\left (x \right )} - 1 = 0$$
</div>

</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>使用后:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left\{2 n \pi + \frac{\pi}{2}\; |\; n \in \mathbb{Z}\right\}$$
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>求解结果可以是空集。</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [102]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">eq</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Eq</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">exp</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">))</span>

<span class="n">func_comparator</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">eq</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">solveset</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>使用solveset()前:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$e^{x} = 0$$
</div>

</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>使用后:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\emptyset$$
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>如果求解失败，会返回一个条件集合。</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [103]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">eq</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Eq</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cos</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">func_comparator</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">eq</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">solveset</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>使用solveset()前:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$- x + \cos{\left (x \right )} = 0$$
</div>

</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>使用后:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left\{x\; |\; x \in \mathbb{C} \wedge - x + \cos{\left (x \right )} = 0 \right\}$$
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><code>solveset()</code>只会显示每个解一次。</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [104]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">eq</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Eq</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="o">**</span><span class="mi">3</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="mi">6</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="o">**</span><span class="mi">2</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">9</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">func_comparator</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">eq</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">solveset</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>使用solveset()前:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$x^{3} - 6 x^{2} + 9 x = 0$$
</div>

</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>使用后:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left\{0, 3\right\}$$
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>如果要获得多项等式每个解的重数，可以用<code>roots()</code></p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [105]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">eq</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Eq</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="o">**</span><span class="mi">3</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="mi">6</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="o">**</span><span class="mi">2</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">9</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">func_comparator</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">eq</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">roots</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>使用roots()前:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$x^{3} - 6 x^{2} + 9 x = 0$$
</div>

</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>使用后:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left \{ 0 : 1, \quad 3 : 2\right \}$$
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="线性系统">线性系统<a class="anchor-link" href="#线性系统">¶</a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><code>linsolve()</code>用于求解线性系统. 线性系统有不同的定义方法。</p>
<h3 id="等式list">等式list<a class="anchor-link" href="#等式list">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [106]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">ls</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span>
    <span class="n">Eq</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">z</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">),</span> 
    <span class="n">Eq</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="n">z</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="p">]</span>

<span class="n">func_comparator</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">ls</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">linsolve</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">z</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>使用linsolve()前:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left [ x + y + z - 1 = 0, \quad x + y + 2 z - 3 = 0\right ]$$
</div>

</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>使用后:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left\{\left ( - y - 1, \quad 2\right )\right\}$$
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>等式list可以简化成表达式list， 如果这些表达式都等于0。</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [107]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">ls</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span>
    <span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">z</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> 
    <span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="n">z</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="mi">3</span>
<span class="p">]</span>

<span class="n">func_comparator</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">ls</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">linsolve</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">z</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>使用linsolve()前:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left [ x + y + z - 1, \quad x + y + 2 z - 3\right ]$$
</div>

</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>使用后:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left\{\left ( - y - 1, \quad 2\right )\right\}$$
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="增广矩阵形式">增广矩阵形式<a class="anchor-link" href="#增广矩阵形式">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [108]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">M</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Matrix</span><span class="p">(</span>
    <span class="p">[</span>
        <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">],</span> 
        <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="p">]</span>
<span class="p">)</span>
    
<span class="n">func_comparator</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">M</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">linsolve</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">z</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>使用linsolve()前:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left[\begin{matrix}1 & 1 & 1 & 1\\1 & 1 & 2 & 3\end{matrix}\right]$$
</div>

</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>使用后:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left\{\left ( - y - 1, \quad y, \quad 2\right )\right\}$$
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="$Ax-=-b$-形式">$Ax = b$ 形式<a class="anchor-link" href="#$Ax-=-b$-形式">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [109]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">M</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Matrix</span><span class="p">(</span>
    <span class="p">[</span>
        <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">],</span> 
        <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="p">]</span>
<span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">ls</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">A</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">b</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">M</span><span class="p">[:,</span> <span class="p">:</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">M</span><span class="p">[:,</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span>

<span class="n">func_comparator</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">ls</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">linsolve</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">z</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>使用linsolve()前:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left ( \left[\begin{matrix}1 & 1 & 1\\1 & 1 & 2\end{matrix}\right], \quad \left[\begin{matrix}1\\3\end{matrix}\right]\right )$$
</div>

</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>使用后:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left\{\left ( - y - 1, \quad y, \quad 2\right )\right\}$$
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="非线性系统">非线性系统<a class="anchor-link" href="#非线性系统">¶</a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><code>solvset()</code>不能解非线性多元系统。 遇到这样的需求用<code>solve()</code>代替。</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [110]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">eq_list</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span>
    <span class="n">Eq</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">),</span>
    <span class="n">Eq</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="p">]</span>

<span class="n">func_comparator</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">eq_list</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">solve</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>使用solve()前:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left [ x y - 1 = 0, \quad x - 2 = 0\right ]$$
</div>

</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>使用后:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left [ \left ( 2, \quad \frac{1}{2}\right )\right ]$$
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="微分方程">微分方程<a class="anchor-link" href="#微分方程">¶</a></h2><p>先定义函数符号变量。</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [111]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">f</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">symbols</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'f'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="bp">cls</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Function</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>然后定义微分方程，例如，$f''(x) - 2f'(x) + f(x) = \sin(x)$</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [112]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">diffeq</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Eq</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">f</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">diff</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="n">f</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">diff</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">f</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">sin</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">))</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>然后用<code>dsolve()</code>求解。</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [113]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">func_comparator</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">diffeq</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">dsolve</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">f</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">))</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>使用dsolve()前:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$f{\left (x \right )} - 2 \frac{d}{d x} f{\left (x \right )} + \frac{d^{2}}{d x^{2}}  f{\left (x \right )} = \sin{\left (x \right )}$$
</div>

</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>使用后:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$f{\left (x \right )} = \left(C_{1} + C_{2} x\right) e^{x} + \frac{1}{2} \cos{\left (x \right )}$$
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>如果无法得到显式的解， <code>dsolve()</code>返回一个隐函数形式。</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [114]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">diffeq</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Eq</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">f</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">diff</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">sin</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">f</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">))),</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">func_comparator</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">diffeq</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">dsolve</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">f</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">))</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>使用dsolve()前:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$\left(- \sin{\left (f{\left (x \right )} \right )} + 1\right) \frac{d}{d x} f{\left (x \right )} = 0$$
</div>

</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>使用后:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_latex output_subarea ">
$$f{\left (x \right )} + \cos{\left (f{\left (x \right )} \right )} = C_{1}$$
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h1 id="参考资料">参考资料<a class="anchor-link" href="#参考资料">¶</a></h1><p><a href="http://docs.sympy.org/latest/index.html">Sympy Documentation</a></p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
 


<script type="text/javascript">if (!document.getElementById('mathjaxscript_pelican_#%@#$@#')) {
    var mathjaxscript = document.createElement('script');
    mathjaxscript.id = 'mathjaxscript_pelican_#%@#$@#';
    mathjaxscript.type = 'text/javascript';
    mathjaxscript.src = '//cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/mathjax/2.7.1/MathJax.js?config=TeX-AMS-MML_HTMLorMML';
    mathjaxscript[(window.opera ? "innerHTML" : "text")] =
        "MathJax.Hub.Config({" +
        "    config: ['MMLorHTML.js']," +
        "    TeX: { extensions: ['AMSmath.js','AMSsymbols.js','noErrors.js','noUndefined.js'], equationNumbers: { autoNumber: 'AMS' } }," +
        "    jax: ['input/TeX','input/MathML','output/HTML-CSS']," +
        "    extensions: ['tex2jax.js','mml2jax.js','MathMenu.js','MathZoom.js']," +
        "    displayAlign: 'center'," +
        "    displayIndent: '0em'," +
        "    showMathMenu: true," +
        "    tex2jax: { " +
        "        inlineMath: [ ['$','$'] ], " +
        "        displayMath: [ ['$$','$$'] ]," +
        "        processEscapes: true," +
        "        preview: 'TeX'," +
        "    }, " +
        "    'HTML-CSS': { " +
        " linebreaks: { automatic: true, width: '95% container' }, " +
        "        styles: { '.MathJax_Display, .MathJax .mo, .MathJax .mi, .MathJax .mn': {color: 'black ! important'} }" +
        "    } " +
        "}); ";
    (document.body || document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0]).appendChild(mathjaxscript);
}
</script>

entry.title: Sympy IV-可视化
entry.content:
<style type="text/css">/*!
*
* IPython notebook
*
*/
/* CSS font colors for translated ANSI escape sequences */
/* The color values are a mix of
   http://www.xcolors.net/dl/baskerville-ivorylight and
   http://www.xcolors.net/dl/euphrasia */
.ansi-black-fg {
  color: #3E424D;
}
.ansi-black-bg {
  background-color: #3E424D;
}
.ansi-black-intense-fg {
  color: #282C36;
}
.ansi-black-intense-bg {
  background-color: #282C36;
}
.ansi-red-fg {
  color: #E75C58;
}
.ansi-red-bg {
  background-color: #E75C58;
}
.ansi-red-intense-fg {
  color: #B22B31;
}
.ansi-red-intense-bg {
  background-color: #B22B31;
}
.ansi-green-fg {
  color: #00A250;
}
.ansi-green-bg {
  background-color: #00A250;
}
.ansi-green-intense-fg {
  color: #007427;
}
.ansi-green-intense-bg {
  background-color: #007427;
}
.ansi-yellow-fg {

}

}

}

}
.ansi-blue-intense-bg {
  background-color: #0065CA;
}
.ansi-magenta-fg {
  color: #D160C4;
}
.ansi-magenta-bg {
  background-color: #D160C4;
}
.ansi-magenta-intense-fg {
  color: #A03196;
}
.ansi-magenta-intense-bg {
  background-color: #A03196;
}
.ansi-cyan-fg {
  color: #60C6C8;
}
.ansi-cyan-bg {

}
.ansi-cyan-intense-fg {

}
.ansi-cyan-intense-bg {

}
.ansi-white-fg {

}

}
.ansi-white-intense-fg {

}
.ansi-white-intense-bg {
  background-color: #A1A6B2;
}
.ansi-default-inverse-fg {
  color: #FFFFFF;
}
.ansi-default-inverse-bg {
  background-color: #000000;
}
.ansi-bold {
  font-weight: bold;
}
.ansi-underline {
  text-decoration: underline;
}
/* The following styles are deprecated an will be removed in a future version */
.ansibold {
  font-weight: bold;
}
.ansi-inverse {
  outline: 0.5px dotted;
}
/* use dark versions for foreground, to improve visibility */
.ansiblack {
  color: black;
}
.ansired {
  color: darkred;
}
.ansigreen {
  color: darkgreen;
}
.ansiyellow {
  color: #c4a000;
}
.ansiblue {
  color: darkblue;
}
.ansipurple {
  color: darkviolet;
}
.ansicyan {
  color: steelblue;
}
.ansigray {
  color: gray;
}
/* and light for background, for the same reason */
.ansibgblack {
  background-color: black;
}
.ansibgred {
  background-color: red;
}
.ansibggreen {
  background-color: green;
}
.ansibgyellow {
  background-color: yellow;
}
